text: Futhi sabavusa kanjalo ukuze babuzane ngamunye, isikhulumi phakathi kwabo (sabuza) sathi “nihlale isikhathi esingakanani”? Bathi “sihlale usuku noma ingxenye yosuku” bathi “iNkosi yenu yazi kabanzi ukuthi nihlale isikhathi esingakanani” ngakho-ke thumelani oyedwa wenu edolobheni (emphakathini) naloluhlamvu lwesiliva bese eyabheka ukuthi yikuphi ukudla okumsulwa ngokwedlulele bese enilethela ingxenye yako futhi aqaphele futhi angalazisi ngisho noyedwa umuntu udaba lwenu
